Sentencas: In the near future, fuel cell-based residential micro-CHP systems will compete with traditional methods of energy supply.
Titulo: The financial viability of an SOFC cogeneration system in single-family dwellings

Sentencas: A micro-CHP system may be considered viable if its incremental capital cost compared to its competitors equals to cumulated savings during a given period of time.
Titulo: The financial viability of an SOFC cogeneration system in single-family dwellings

Sentencas: A simplified model is developed in this study to estimate the operation of a residential solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) system.
Titulo: The financial viability of an SOFC cogeneration system in single-family dwellings

Sentencas: A comparative assessment of the SOFC system vis-a-vis heating systems based on gas, oil and electricity is conducted using the simplified model for a single-family house located in Ottawa and Vancouver.
Titulo: The financial viability of an SOFC cogeneration system in single-family dwellings

Sentencas: The energy consumption of the house is estimated using the HOT2000 building simulation program.
Titulo: The financial viability of an SOFC cogeneration system in single-family dwellings

Sentencas: A financial analysis is carried out to evaluate the sensitivity of the maximum allowable capital cost with respect to system sizing, acceptable payback period, energy price and the electricity buyback strategy of an energy utility.
Titulo: The financial viability of an SOFC cogeneration system in single-family dwellings
